Topic.Title: Obama still refuses to cut spending in any way

Message.Msg: ... I just use the term "money printing" to relate to the level that an Obama supporter might be at. Yes, the subjects of high-powered money, the money multiplier, monetary velocity, PQ=MV, etc. is a great subject to discuss, but people on this board are going to glaze over if you talk about it. One of Obama's biggest constituencies is the under-25 crowd... I know 2 of them personally who voted for Obama because they saw him on TV with Justin Bieber and thought he was hip... ... how far do you think a discussion on the inner-workings of the federal reserve would get with people like that, Lew? S

Topic.Title: Bush budget year 2009 was the largest deficit in US history. and they have been lower every year since

Message.Msg: #$%$ liar, Obummers stimulus package of $787 billion was in 2009. But you put it in Bush's year when he was in retirement in Texas. This is typical of libiots thinking, blame somebody else for your mistakes. Can you say KOOL-AID.

Topic.Title: Bush budget year 2009 was the largest deficit in US history. and they have been lower every year since

Message.Msg: And your numbers are all wrong. 2012 deficit was 1.64 trillion, second highest behind his record setting year of 2009 (1.89 trillion). December deficit alone was 1.72 billion. If our monthly deficit remains there, the boy will set another record.

Topic.Title: Bush budget year 2009 was the largest deficit in US history. and they have been lower every year since

Message.Msg: And you suit your math to fit your inane donkey agenda. Obviously, statistics was never your strength.

Message.Title: Global Warming?
